column3: “Calms me instantly and has amazing flavor and beautiful aesthetics”
“I don't review shit on the internet, but I have to tell everyone how much I love this strain. it's worked some magic on my mood and tension. I feel great. Definitely an immediate favorite.”
“Great strain for going out and hanging out with friends. Nice body high with clear mind, very smooth when smoking. I feel it calming my body I suffer from joint pain. Great strain!”
“One of my favorite Indica strain. Relaxes you and if continue consuming it you get soo relaxed you are going to have the best sleep if suffer of Insomnia”
“One of my favorites!! Awesome smell and taste! Very nice and pleasant high.”

“got this one as a cartridge in ABQ, NM. So far, I really like it. It tastes wonderfully and the high is a perfect hybrid for me.
My body gets high - getting rid of my chronic pain
my mind gets high - but not stoned. my mind is clear and focused.”
“🚨 Super Relaxing, this is my Top Shelf & should be yours too! 👍🏽🇵🇷”
“by smoking a joint  and watching the sunset it helps you a lot with stress and anxiety.”
“Efecto relajante, pero controlado. Buena para buscar el sueño. Sabor un poco fuerte pero no desagradable.”
“Beautiful purple strain, Full body relaxation. Many cristals 100% recomend”
“Pretty chill, not my favorite to wind down but definitely not bad. Bought from a dispensary in San Juan, not disappointed or excited about this one.”
“Like it :D, the skunk smell and the taste that it gives u afterwards its great. Best to smoke it in the couch.”
“Exelente para aliviar el dolor de migraña. Un hibrido espectacular !!”
